ability.Merciless: This Pokemon's attacks are critical hits if the target is poisoned.
ability.Intoxicate: When this Pokemon uses a Poison-type move, it has a 10% chance at the end of the turn of increasing its Special Attack by 1 stage.

Sludge Bomb.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Scald.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Venom Drench.effect: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 1 stage if the target is poisoned.
